record.name: VR10
record.rdesc: VRxx: VPD Record contains the slot maps and other VPD data, that is unique to a FRU. There may be more than one of this VPD record within the VPD.

keyword.name: DC
keyword.kwdesc: Date Code: In the form "BD yyyyMMddhhmm". BD = Build Date.

keyword.name: FL
keyword.kwdesc: FRU Label: A variable length ASCII character data to provides the label of the FRU. If the label length is less than the field length, the label will be left justified in the field and padded with ASCII blanks in the unused bytes.
